metadata.title: Z5 Screen Protector for Nikon Z 5 Z5 Mirrorless Digital Camera & Hot Shoe Cover,ULBTER 0.3mm 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Saver Anti-Scrach Anti-Fingerprint Anti-Bubble Anti-Dust [2+3Pack]
features: ✪LCD Screen Protector and Hot Shoe cover perfectly fit for Nikon Z 5 Mirrorless Digital Camera . Not for other model. Easy to install with 100% bubble-free adhesives, bubble-free installation.
✪9H Hardness - Longer tempering time, which made the screen protector has a higher hardness. Prevents the camera screen from high impact drops, scratches such as keys and knives, scrapes, and bumps.
✪99.99% HD Clarity - High-transparency provides high-definition clear viewing.
✪Highest definition and sensitivity: High-quality material and only 0.3mm thickness, extremely thin to bring you a high permeable and won't reduce the sensitivity.
✪Hot shoe cover-Innovative circular design takes up less space than blocky 2- or 3-axis levels and help protect your camera hot shoe, prevent scratches, hits, moisture, dust and keep clean.
description: ULBTER Anti-Bubble Anti-Scratch Anti-Fingerprint Ultra-Clear 9H Tempered Glass

Adopting high quality material and longer tempering time which will give a complete protection for your Camera LCD Screen.  After using this screen protector, You don't need to worry about your camera screen being broken and damaged.
Crystal clear, incomparable light transmission up to 99.99%. All the color of the screen shows incisively and vividly without any distortion.
Bubble-Free adhesive makes it easy to install this tempered glass screen protector. It features 2.5D Rounded Edges and touches smoothly at all edges.
This Premium Tempered Glass prevents the glass from shattering, and resistant scratch to protect your camera from sharp objects also like keys, knife etc.
Hotshoe Cover with camera bubble spirit level
Center bubble to get precise horizontal leveling. Works particularly great on a tripod or camera stabilizer.

3×Tempered Glass Flim appliable for Nikon Z5 Mirrorless Digital Camera LCD Screen.  3X Wet Cleaning Paper.  3X Dry Cleaning Paper.  3X Dust-Absorber.  1 X Beautiful Packaging Box. 2×Hotshoe cover with bubble spirit level Note:Accessories only, camera not included.  If you are not satisfied with our product, please send us a message we will solve the problem for you.
